author: Toàn Nguyễn
content: This is a very complete course. I especially liked that not only the language was explained, but especially the things around it. So Postgres, Redis, Gin, gRPC, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS and CI/CD.
video_title: Backend Master Class [Golang + Postgres + Kubernetes + gRPC]

author: Việt Châu
content: Thanks to this course, I've significantly improved my IT Support skills and successfully managed my first large-scale project!

author: Mỹ Trương
content: The techniques I learned in this course have been crucial in advancing my career in digital marketing. Highly recommend!
